## WchNgPageService interface

Service interface that allows to resolve a rendering context given the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WchNgPageService extends WchPageService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getRenderingContextByActivatedRoute(aRoute)](./ng-api.wchngpageservice.getrenderingcontextbyactivatedroute.md) | Resolves the rendering context given the router |
|  [getRenderingContextByUrlSegments(aSegments)](./ng-api.wchngpageservice.getrenderingcontextbyurlsegments.md) | Resolves the rendering context given the url segments |
